effect.sword_shield: Lowers the target’s Attack by one stage. Heals the user by the target’s current Attack, including modifiers, but not including this move’s Attack-lowering effect. If the target’s Attack is already at -6, this move will fail. In any other situation that would prevent a stat modification, the healing will still succeed.

If the target’s Attack is already at -6, this move will fail. In any other situation that would prevent a stat modification, the healing will still succeed.

If the target’s Attack is already at -6, this move will fail. In any other situation that would prevent a stat modification, the healing will still succeed.
effect.brilliant_diamond_and_shining_pearl: Lowers the target’s Attack by one stage. Heals the user by the target’s current Attack, including modifiers, but not including this move’s Attack-lowering effect. If the target’s Attack is already at -6, this move will fail. In any other situation that would prevent a stat modification, the healing will still succeed.
effect.legends_arceus: Lowers the target’s Attack by one stage. Heals the user by the target’s current Attack, including modifiers, but not including this move’s Attack-lowering effect. If the target’s Attack is already at -6, this move will fail. In any other situation that would prevent a stat modification, the healing will still succeed.

short_effect.sword_shield: Heals the user by the target’s current Attack stat and lowers the target’s Attack by one stage.
short_effect.the_isle_of_armor: Heals the user by the target’s current Attack stat and lowers the target’s Attack by one stage.
short_effect.the_crown_tundra: Heals the user by the target’s current Attack stat and lowers the target’s Attack by one stage.
short_effect.brilliant_diamond_and_shining_pearl: Heals the user by the target’s current Attack stat and lowers the target’s Attack by one stage.
short_effect.legends_arceus: Heals the user by the target’s current Attack stat and lowers the target’s Attack by one stage.

flavor_text.sword_shield: The user restores its HP by the same amount as the target’s Attack stat. It also lowers the target’s Attack stat.
flavor_text.legends_arceus: The user restores its HP by the same amount as the target's Attack stat. It also lowers the target's Attack stat.
